mapper.sql: WITH PAGE_INFO AS ( SELECT #{PAGE_SIZE} PAGE_SIZE , #{PAGE_NUM} PAGE_NUM ) , LST AS ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PAGE_KEY) RNUM FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT Top 1 DEPT_CD ,DEPT_NM ,FULL_NM ,UP_DEPT_CD FROM TB_SPUSH_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CD = #{DEPT_CD}

SELECT Top 1 T1.EMP_NO ,T1.USER_NM ,T5.USER_ID ,T1.DEPT_CD ,T2.DEPT_NM ,T1.POS_CD ,T3.POS_NM ,T2.FULL_NM ,T1.TEL_NO ,T1.CELL_NO ,T1.EMAIL ,T1.PHOTO_PATH ,T1.RESP_CD ,T4.RESP_NM ,T1.WORK_YN ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T1.REG_DT, 121) AS REG_DT FROM TB_SPUSH_EMPLOYEE T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_DEPT T2 ON T1.DEPT_CD = T2.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_POS T3 ON T1.POS_CD = T3.POS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_RESP T4 ON T1.RESP_CD = T4.RESP_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPUSH_USER T5 ON T1.EMP_NO = T5.EMP_NO AND T5.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE T1.WORK_YN = 'Y' AND T5.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
